You may check whether a patient is alive by providing a patient ID where the ID ranges from 0 to 99. Make observations by specifying a single integer ID. If the patient is alive, the output will be 0, otherwise 1, if the the patient is dead.
You can think before you choose to decide which ID you want to observe.

Here is an example:
<thought> your thought </thought>
<observe>1</observe>
When asked to answer a question about the environment, respond in the format specified in the question.
<thought> your thought</thought>
<answer> your answer </answer>
